post.title: Ali Farka Touré & Toumani Diabaté – Ali & Toumani
post.content: Ali and Toumani is a 2010 record by Malian musicians Ali Farka Touré on the guitar and providing vocals and Toumani Diabaté on the kora. The album was released after Touré’s death in 2006.
